https://tmrev.io/movie/187064-4 Buildings, Facing the Sea 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/c2LSHiDEjTKyK6Fbo6HEUdnHSQZ.jpg Three months after the March 2011 disaster in Fukushima, TEPCO, the electric company operating the nuclear power plant, installed a livecam on the facilities. The images, on which days and minutes add up, are available online. Using them for sole visual material, such is the daring challenge Philippe Rouy has taken up in 4 bâtiments, face à la mer. (Nicola Féodoroff, FID 2012) 4 Buildings, Facing the Sea
